description: DAMAC BAY by CAVALLI- the choice of this One-Bedroom Apartment one of a kind, an invest for you and your future with no regret. The development is built to the highest standards and offers a range of world-class amenities such as a state-of-the-art gym, a temperature-controlled swimming pool, and a children's play area. The prime location of Danube Viewz in JLT offers residents easy access to some of the city's finest dining, shopping, and entertainment options. The development is also in close proximity to the JLT metro station, providing residents with easy access to the rest of the city.
